name: Shadow Jumper
description:
• This is a game that was created in 2 days. It was very fun to create this game, and during this time I learned important notions.

          I hope you enjoy it! : D

Controls

  • arrow up - move up 
  • arrow down - move down

Tools used

  • Unity

Credits

Music: LightMusic

How to Download

  • Download the.zip folder and locate it on your PC.
  • Right click on it and select "Extract All."
  • This will extract all the game files into a folder on your PC. Activate the executable and enjoy!
